Test Name: HIT Antibody by Serotonin Release Assay (SRA)
Specimen Type: Fresh platelet-rich plasma (PRP) and platelet-poor plasma (PPP)
Purpose: To detect heparin-induced thrombocytopenia (HIT) antibodies by measuring serotonin release from donor platelets.
Container: ACD (acid-citrate-dextrose) or sodium citrate blood collection tube
